document_data.caption: ''Talon'' set into its carving.
document_data.name: ''Talon''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Talon''''' was a powerful and strongly enchanted [[longsword]].
document_data.Description:
''Talon'' was made of three pieces: the tongue ([[blade]]), the eye (the centerpiece [[gem]] set in the middle of the crossguard), and the hilt. Fitting the [[sword]] into its carving would combine the pieces, producing the powerful ''+4'' [[weapon]].

As well as being a weapon, ''Talon'' was also used as an access key to the Crimson Tower in [[Darkmoon|Temple Darkmoon]].
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], pieces of the legendary sword were scattered around Darkmoon. The [[Heroes of Waterdeep]] gathered the parts of ''Talon'', and assembled it. They used it to make their way further into the [[evil]] temple and destroyed [[Dran Draggore]].
